stage.name: Stage1
stage.code:
<DllImport("User32.dll", SetLastError:=True, CharSet:=CharSet.Auto)> _ Public Shared Function GetWindowTextLength(ByVal hwnd As Int32) As Integer End Function
<DllImport("User32.dll", SetLastError:=True)> _ Public Shared Function GetWindowText(ByVal hWnd As IntPtr, ByVal lpString As System.Text.StringBuilder, ByVal nMaxCount As Integer) As Integer End Function
<DllImport("User32.dll", SetLastError:=True, CharSet:=CharSet.Auto)> _ Public Shared Function GetWindowText(ByVal hwnd As Int32, _ ByVal lpString As System.Text.StringBuilder, _ ByVal cch As Integer) As Integer End Function
Delegate Function EnumWindowsProc(ByVal hWnd As System.IntPtr, ByVal lParam As IntPtr) As Boolean
''' <summary> ''' Enumerates all top-level windows on the screen by passing ''' the handle to each window, in turn, to an ''' application-defined callback function ''' </summary> ''' <param name="lpEnumFunc">Pointer to an application-defined callback function. For more information, see EnumWindowsProc.</param> ''' <param name="lParam">Specifies an application-defined value to be passed to the callback function.</param> ''' <returns>If the function succeeds, the return value is nonzero.</returns> <DllImport("User32.dll", SetLastError:=True, CharSet:=CharSet.Auto)> _ Public Shared Function EnumWindows(ByVal lpEnumFunc As EnumWindowsProc, ByVal lParam As IntPtr) As Boolean End Function
Private Function EnumWindowsWindowTextMatchCallback(ByVal hWnd As System.IntPtr, ByVal lParam As IntPtr) As Boolean
'Get Window Text Dim capacity As Integer = 1+ 2 * GetWindowTextLength(hWnd.ToInt32) Dim lpString As New System.Text.StringBuilder(capacity) GetWindowText(hWnd, lpString, lpString.Capacity-1) Dim WindowTitle As String = lpString.ToString
mWindowTitles.Add(WindowTitle)
Return True End Function
private mWindowTitles As System.Collections.Generic.List(Of String)

stage.name: new
stage.narrative:
Clean Up Page
This is an optional page where you might choose to perform some finalisation (or "cleanup") tasks as your business object is closed down.
The cleanup action will be called automatically immediately after closing your business object at the end of a business process.
You will not be able to call this action from a business process, nor will it be called at any other time than before the disposal of the business object.

stage.name: new
stage.narrative:
Initialise Page
This is an optional page where you might choose to perform some initialisation tasks after your business object is loaded.
The initialise action will be called automatically immediately after loading your business object.
You will not be able to call this action from a business process, nor will it be called at any other time than after the creation of the object.

stage.name: Connected?
stage.narrative: Some applications (eg explorer) launch something else and exit

choice.name: Generic Main Window Check Window Active

decision.expression: [Launched Applications.Process Name] = [Process Name] and [Launched Applications.Window Title] = [Window Title]

stage.name: Launched Applications
stage.narrative: Identifying data about applications that we have launched

stage.name: Get Window Titles
stage.code:
mWindowTitles = New List(Of String) EnumWindows(AddressOf EnumWindowsWindowTextMatchCallback, IntPtr.Zero)
Open_Windows = New DataTable() Open_Windows.Columns.Add("Window Title") for EAch title as string in mwindowtitles If not String.ISNullOrEmpty(title) If title <> "Default IME" andalso title <> "M" Then open_windows.rows.add(new object() {title}) End if End if next
